medical_history.chief_complaint: Multiple verrucous lesions on hands, forearms, feet, and lower legs.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms developed since the summer of 2003, with generalized pruritus and weight loss of 5 kg within the last 3 weeks.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of hyperuricemia treated with allopurinol; hypothyroidism diagnosed and treated with levothyroxine.
medical_history.social_history: Ceased smoking 15 years earlier, with a history of 15 pack years.
